a) Click this link to create a GitHub account: [https://github.com/](https://github.com/)  

Enter your email and click `Sign up for GitHub`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS00a.png" width="600px" /></br>

b) Enter a password and a username (anything you want and that is accepted, not very important).  
     Type `n` to decline advertisement emails.</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS00.png" width="500px" /></br>

c) Play and solve the puzzle then click `Create account`</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS01.png" width="500px" /></br>

d)  GitHub will send you a verification code. Open your mail and check your inbox (check your spam-folder if not received after a couple of minutes).</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS02.png" width="500px" /></br>

e) If a personalization sequence starts, click `Skip personalization ` at the bottom.</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS03.png" width="600px" /></br>

f) Leave the page that opened as it is. Don't close it.</br>

<img src="/vendors/github/img/NewNS04.png" width="600px" /></br>

You have created your GitHub account.</br>
